title: Solar Orbiter Level 2 Phase Space Density (PSD) of Pitch Angle Data (PAD) from Solar Wind Analyser (SWA) Electron Analyser System (EAS) - C. J. Owen (MSSL-UCL, University College London, UK)

info.x_cadence_note: Cadence based on variable 'EPOCH' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/solar-orbiter/swa/science/l2/eas-pad-psd/2020/solo_l2_swa-eas-pad-psd_20200616t090001-20200616t090500_v03.cdf. This most common cadence occurred for 100.0000% of the 2399 timesteps. Cadence = 125000000 [ns] = PT0.125S.
info.contact: C. J. Owen @ MSSL-UCL, University College London, UK

parameters.name: Time
parameters.x_description: Epoch in nano-seconds since J2000, encoded as terrestrial time on rotating Earth Geoid

parameters.name: SWA_EAS_BM_Data
parameters.description: Electron pitch angle data - Phase Space Density [available 06/2020 - 10/2020, varying energy, azimuth and elevation angles, CDAWeb plots not supported]

parameters.name: SWA_EAS_PAD_PSD_Data
parameters.description: Electron pitch angle data - Phase Space Density [available 04/2021 - ongoing, varying energy, azimuth and elevation angles, CDAWeb plots not supported]
